data.title: Insurance & Financial Navigation services
data.meta_description: All FCS offices have a dedicated Patient Financial Navigator who will be your point of contact for any insurance related questions.
data.text:
Medical bills, insurance claims, benefits and deductibles can be confusing and overwhelming. Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute (FCS) is committed to being a supportive resource for our patients.

All FCS offices have a dedicated Patient Financial Navigator who will be your point of contact for any insurance related questions while you are in the office. You will meet with a Patient Financial Navigator during one of your initial visits and at any time that you may have questions about your account or insurance coverage.

The Patient Financial Navigator can also discuss patient assistance programs or payment options to provide you with various types of financial support for any out-of-pocket expenses related to your treatment.

Additionally, our business office team in Fort Myers, FL will verify your insurance coverage, obtain authorizations, file your insurance claims and work directly with your insurance company. Contact our business office at 877-327-2228 should any issues arise related to your insurance or visit FLCancer.com/Contact and click on âBilling Inquiry.â

FCS accepts most major insurance plans. Please contact your Patient Financial Navigator to determine if your physician is in-network with your health insurance coverage.

FCS patients who wish to switch insurance plans may make changes in coverage during the regular Open Enrollment periods. For more information, talk with your FCS Patient Financial Navigator.
